Label: SSSOM Code
Description: Root level term that groups all OMTs. Grouping class, should not be used in annotation.

Label: Match Type
Description: The technique by which the match was made. Grouping class, should not be used in annotation

Label: Lexical  match
Description: Match is based on any lexical information provided by the subject and the object.

Label: Logical  match
Description: Match is based on the logical definition of the subject and the object (logical equivalence), as determined by a semantic reasoner.

Label: Human Curated  match
Description: Match is based on human curation.

Label: Complex  match
Description: Match is based on a combination of match types. It is recommended that the tool used for the match is provided, and more information given in a comment.

Label: Unspecified  match
Description: The exact match was given by an external source (for example an ontology), but its method is unknown.

Label: Semantic Similarity Match
Description: The match is based on the semantic similarity between two terms. The semantic similarity score should be provided. The algorithm should be given as part of the metadata (tool field).

Label: Term Match
Description: A match between two terms. Should be used in curation.

Label: Class Match
Description: A match between two OWL/RDFS classes.

Label: Object Property Match
Description: A match between two OWL object properties..

Label: Individual Match
Description: A match between two OWL Individuals.

Label: Pre-processing method
Description: Any preprocessing that was applied prior to the match.

Label: Taxon restriction removal
Description: For the match, it was assumed that the terms that originally applied to different taxa now have no taxon restriction.
